carrier.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a company that moves goods or passengers from one place to another
carrier.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a military vehicle or ship used to move soldiers, weapons etc
carrier.translation[0].definitions[2].de: someone who passes a disease or gene to other people, especially without being affected by it themselves
carrier.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: carriers of the lung disease, TB
carrier.translation[0].definitions[5].de: a company that provides a service such as insurance or telephones
carrier.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a person or company whose job is to TRANSPORT goods from one place to another
carrier.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: national carriers like Pickfords, with their own warehouses and regular clientele
the American overseas air carrier, United Airlines
